scripts.start: docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose-dev.yaml up -d --build lusmu
scripts.test:integration: docker exec -t lusmu-dev npm run test:integration
scripts.e2e:run: set -o allexport && source .env.development && set +o allexport && cd e2e && npm test
scripts.e2e:open: set -o allexport && source .env.development && set +o allexport && cd e2e && npm start
scripts.e2e:docker: docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose-dev.yaml run --build e2e cypress run
scripts.e2e:ci: docker compose -f compose.yaml -f compose-ci.yaml run e2e cypress run
